title: # 465 - Nathan Florence & ME
description:
Today I sit down with Pro Surfer Nathan Florence. We talk about his month long sailing trip, big wave surfing, workouts, being held under water, his idols, and much more!

 

Check out Nathan’s Vlog here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6uX6GF5q2JxLjMkyivM2Og  

 

This episode is brought to you by Tushy. Go to http://www.hellotushy.com/BERTCAST to get 10% off your order and FREE shipping.
